extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites    CISC226 and CISC326 and CISC324 and MATH111 and PHYS106.

basic.description: An introduction to 'engines' used in networked 3-dimensional games. Topics include game-engine architecture and components providing 3-dimensional rendering, physics simulation, sound, artificial intelligence and networking services.
basic.subject: CISC
basic.title: Game Engine Development
